channel.title: Brain on Zakhar the Robot
channel.description: Recent content in Brain on Zakhar the Robot

item.description: ROS instalation # At the time of summer 2020 there is no way to install noetic on Raspberry Pi OS. That’s why we will build it manually ROS Noetic build # Step 1 — Set up ROS Noetic repo on Raspberry Pi 4 # 1 sudo sh -c 'echo "deb http://packages.ros.org/ros/ubuntu buster main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ros-noetic.list' Step 2 — Add official ROS key # 1 sudo apt-key adv --keyserver 'hkp://keyserver.
